name: GameFAQs - Monospace Font Size Addon - Smaller
description: A simple style addon that makes base font size smaller allowing to see more text lines per browser view. Designed especially for those reading one or several instances of FAQs/walkthroughs while playing. Can be used in combination with any other style for GameFAQs.
additional_info:
This a Smaller version: 65% (the smallest readable) of original font size using Consolas font family.

Attention!: By default the style will work in Windows Vista/7/8 only. If you want it for MacOSX or Linux you would need to install Consolas font manually.
